name: Tax Evasion
description: Invade the IRS to get back what is rightfully yours. In this roguelike, you play as an unfortunate newcomer to your office job, but upon acquiring this job, you were taxed like $1,000,000 for it. Now the only way to get out of your MASSIVE debt is to invade the nearest IRS building, and beat up every person who has some semblance of power. As you climb the 9* floors, You slowly take out the IRS hierarchy, acquire items, unlock characters and abilities, and as a result, your attempts to climb the floors of this building might prove successful.
